name: Chorus (Vintage)
description: This algorithm is a stereo chorus effect, modelled on that of the classic Juno-6 polysynth, based on measurements of the author's own unit. Those with keen ears may recognise it as the chorus that is built into the Poly Wavetable algorithm on the disting EX.

input_ports.name:
Left/mono
input
input_ports.description: The left or mono input bus.

input_ports.name: Right input
input_ports.description: The right input bus, if stereo.

output_ports.name: Output mode
output_ports.description: The standard Add/Replace mode selector as described above.
